versions.title: Sprunki Phase 1
versions.description: Start your journey here! Make simple tunes and learn the basics of music creation in this fun, beginner-friendly game.

versions.title: Sprunki Phase 2
versions.description: Level up your music skills! Mix beats and create catchy tunes with new sounds and cool effects.

versions.title: Sprunki Phase 3
versions.description: Enter the spooky world! Experience thrilling adventures with scary sounds and mysterious transformations.

versions.title: Sprunki Phase 4
versions.description: Feel the rhythm! Jump and move to the beat in this exciting music-adventure combo game.

versions.title: Sprunki Phase 5
versions.description: Become a music master! Create amazing songs with tons of new sounds and share them with friends.

versions.title: Sprunki Phase 6
versions.description: Mix different music styles! Try new genres and create your own unique sound combinations.

versions.title: Sprunki Phase 7
versions.description: Join the party! Make music with friends and enjoy fun multiplayer challenges together.

versions.title: Sprunki Phase 8
versions.description: Music on the go! Create awesome beats anywhere with this mobile-friendly music maker.

versions.title: Sprunki Phase 9
versions.description: Music meets adventure! Jump, run, and make music in this exciting rhythm-based platform game.

versions.title: Sprunki Phase 10
versions.description: The ultimate Sprunki experience! Combine everything you've learned to create amazing musical masterpieces.
